title: Dua for Seeking Good in This World and the Hereafter
arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
transliteration: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanatan wa fil-akhirati hasanatan waqina 'adhaban-nar
translation: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

title: Dua for Forgiveness (Sayyidul Istighfar)
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لا إِلَهَ إِلا أَنْتَ خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ
transliteration: Allahumma anta Rabbi la ilaha illa anta, khalaqtani wa ana 'abduka
translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no deity except You. You created me and I am Your servant.

title: Short Dua for Guidance
translation: Guide us to the straight path.

title: Dua for Patience
arabic: رَبَّنَا أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
transliteration: Rabbana afrigh 'alayna sabran wa tawaffana muslimeen
translation: Our Lord, pour upon us patience and let us die as Muslims [in submission to You].

title: Dua for Parents' Righteousness
translation: My Lord, have mercy upon them (my parents) as they brought me up when I was small.

title: Dua for Success in Tasks
translation: My Lord, expand for me my chest (grant me confidence and ease).

title: Dua for Protection from Evil
translation: I seek refuge with Allah from the accursed Satan.

title: Dua for Healing
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ النَّاسِ أَذْهِبِ الْبَأْسَ اشْفِ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي
transliteration: Allahumma rabban-nasi, adhhib al-ba'sa, ishfi anta ash-shafi
translation: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the harm and heal; You are the Healer.

title: Dua for Ease in Affairs
arabic: يَا مُسَهِّلَ الأَمْرِ يَا مُفَسِّرَ القَضَاءِ
transliteration: Ya musahhil al-amri ya mufassir al-qada'
translation: O One who makes affairs easy, O One who resolves matters.

title: Dua for Gratitude
translation: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

title: Dua Before Sleep
translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.

title: Dua for Knowledge
translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

title: Dua for Entering Home
arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا
translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave.

title: Dua for Travel
arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ
transliteration: Subhana allathee sakhkhara lana hadha wama kunna lahu muqrineen
translation: Glory be to the One Who has subjected this to us, and we could not have it (by our efforts).

title: Dua for Repentance
translation: I repent to Allah.

title: Dua for Strength
translation: My Lord, cause me to enter a truthful entrance.

title: Dua for Removing Worry
arabic: لا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
transliteration: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimin
translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed I have been of the wrongdoers.

title: Morning Remembrance (Short)
arabic: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ
transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa huwa Al-Hayyul-Qayyum
translation: Allah — there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.

title: Dua for Mercy
translation: O Allah, You are my Lord and I am Your servant.

title: Dua for Protection from Debt
translation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have permitted against what You have forbidden.

title: Dua for Good Ending
translation: O Allah, make my end good.

title: Dua for Family
arabic: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ
transliteration: Rabbana hab lana from azwajina wa dhurriyyatina qurrata a'yunin
translation: Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes.

title: Dua for Sincerity
translation: O Allah, make my deeds sincere for Your sake alone.

title: Dua for Removing Hardship
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا
transliteration: Allahumma la sahl illa ma ja'altahu sahl
translation: O Allah, there is no ease except that which You make easy.

title: Dua for Protection from Trials
arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِن نَّسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا
transliteration: Rabbana la tu'akhidhna in nasina aw akhta'na
translation: Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we forget or make a mistake.

title: Dua for Righteous Deeds
translation: And say: My Lord, increase me in guidance.

title: Dua for Reliance on Allah
transliteration: Hasbiya Allahu wa la ashtariqu bihi
translation: Allah is sufficient for me and I do not associate anything with Him.

title: Dua for Steadfastness
arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا مَعَ الْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ
translation: Our Lord, do not place us with the wrongdoing people.

title: Dua for Forgiveness and Mercy
translation: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves (we ask for Your forgiveness).

title: Dua of Prophet Yunus (When Distressed)
arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
transliteration: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimin
translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed I have been of the wrongdoers.
